11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Burdah bin Abi Musa narrated from his father that the Messenger of Allah said:"Three will receive their reward twice: A slave who fulfills the rights of Allah and the rights of his owners, then he will be given his reward twice. And a man who has a beautiful slave girl, so he teaches her good manners, then he frees her, then he married her seeking the Face of Allah by that; then he will be given his reward twice. And a man who believed in an earlier Book, then another Book came to him and he believed in it; then he will be given his reward twice

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْفَضْلِ فِي ذَلِكَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtue Of That
